Package com.example.app.service

Interface ApplicantService

All Superinterfaces:
UserService
All Known Subinterfaces:
OfficerService
All Known Implementing Classes:
ApplicantServiceImpl, OfficerServiceImpl
public interface ApplicantService extends UserService
Service interface for managing applicant-related operations. This interface provides methods to interact with the applicant service and perform various actions related to applicants.
